entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • PhysicalFileProviderTests.TokensFiredOnFileDeleted fails #101401
  • System.Net.Http.Functional.Tests.HttpRequestMessageTest.HttpRequest_BodylessMethod_NoContentLength throwing FormatException #101399
  • Direct package references on System.Collections.Immutable and System.Reflection.Metadata are causing build issues in source-build #101395
  • [API Proposal]: method overload `DateTimeOffset.Equals(DateTimeOffset other, DateTimeComparison comparisonType)` #101393
    Future
  • [QUIC] Check inputs for `QuicConnection.CloseAsync` and `QuicStream.Abort` #101385
    9.0.0
  • System.Threading.Tasks.Parallel.Tests are timing out on s390x #101380
    Future
  • [Test Failure] SocketsHttpHandlerTest_Cookies_Http3.GetAsync_SetCookieContainerAndCookieHeader_BothCookiesSent #101377
    9.0.0
  • [Test Failure] SocketsHttpHandler_HttpClientHandler_AltSvc_Test_Http3.AltSvc_ConnectionFrame_UpgradeFrom20_Success #101376
    9.0.0
  • [mono][maccatalyst] Failures in System.IO.IsolatedStorage.Tests #101371
    9.0.0
  • [mono][interpreter] Mono interpreter is crashing during System.Data.Odbc.Tests (linux-x64 Release Mono_Interpreter_LibrariesTests) #101370
    9.0.0
  • [android] System.Buffers.ArrayBufferWriter running out-of-memory #101368
    9.0.0
  • [mono][tvos] Failure in System.Memory.Tests.Span.StringSearchValuesTests.SimpleIndexOfAnyValues #101367
    9.0.0
  • Named pipes on MacOS can't connect in .NET 8 #101366
  • [NativeAOT, win-x86] Bad EH info generated for nested trys #101364
  • Assorted tests failing on x86 Windows #101363
  • Test failure: _Runtime_86207::Runtime_86027.TestRotateLeft1() #101361
  • IList<T> optimizations become deoptimizations for arrays and array wrappers #101360
    Future

Closed

  • IL2026 and IL3050 code fixers generate invalid code #100474
  • [NativeAOT] Support InlineArray larger than 1Mb #98024
  • GetTypes on a collectibe assembly fails under special circumstances #101230
  • Question about dll resolution in hostfxr #96271
  • Behaviour of GC HeapHardLimit #101183
  • Native AoT-compiled application fails with TypeInitializationException in latest daily build for .NET 9 #101010
  • Loader-related error messages are *extremely* unhelpful. #101298
  • Build error NETSDK1124 with NET8 RC2 when multiple TargetFrameworks #94406
  • [API Proposal]: New method HashSet<T>.AddOrUpdate that replaces an existing element if found #101003
  • CustomAttributeBuilder throws for Nullable<T> properties #101384
  • CultureInfo gives incorrect information #101383
  • System.Net.Qui #101382
  • Redundant bound check for span.Length == 0 pattern #67270
    9.0.0
  • Wasm.Build.Tests.WasmNativeDefaultsTests.DefaultsWithPublish failing #94926
    9.0.0
  • [browser][MT] MutexTests - operation does not support unaligned accesses #96191
    9.0.0
  • [browser][MT] PlatformNotSupportedException Blocking wait is not supported on the JS interop threads #98804
    9.0.0
  • [MT][browser] MutexTests.AbandonExisting #98830
    9.0.0
  • [browser] `Process terminated` assert handling at icall.c:6162 #100249
    9.0.0
  • Wasm test timeout: Process ... didn't exit within 00:30:00 and will be killed #100721
    9.0.0
  • ComInterfaceGenerator.Unit.Tests failed on linux-x64 running interpreter #100683
    9.0.0
  • Native AOT bad code gen for constrained call #99198
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: `ArgumentException.ThrowIf` method #99035

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove AD0001 from NoWarn #101404
    needs-area-label
  • JIT: metrics for profile consistency, gdv, devirt... #101403
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Share return value handling in trim analysis #101398
    needs-area-label
  • [wasm] Do not use link flags for bitcode compilation #101397
    area-Build-mono
  • Dedup UnboundedChannel and UnboundedPriorityChannel #101396
    area-System.Threading.Channels
  • [WASI] update SDK 22 and wasmtime 19.0.2 #101392
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-wasi, 9.0.0
  • [browser][hybrid] drop `wrap_error_root`, `wrap_no_error_root` #101390
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization
  • JIT: Check more invariants on ABI info #101372
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [LoongArch64] amend the LoongArch64Classifier::Classify for passing struct. #101365
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • ARM64: Optimize Volatile.Read/Write for floats #101359
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Merged

  • Un-revert ratelimiting change #97041
    area-System.Threading
  • Set generic ctx type to void* for non-x86 path #101394
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [cdac] Read contract descriptor from target #101208
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Fix S.D.Tracing testapps with AOT #101373
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Only add interface methods to _virtual_methods cache #101139
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Skip DispatchProxy app test on native AOT #101374
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Remove `IlcKeepManagedDebuggerSupport` #101369
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Download contents into a subfolder to preserve previous paths #101391
    blocking-official-build, area-Infrastructure, 9.0.0
  • Optimize BigInteger formatting #100181
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Simplify ReadOnlySpan pointer ctor #101362
    needs-area-label
  • Disable AllItemsEnumeratedOnce_For test on s390x #101389
    area-System.Threading.Tasks
  • JIT: Remove Compiler::fgCanonicalizedFirstBB #101358
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono] UnsafeAccessor: Enable tests for extern static methods without type parameters #101265
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • JIT: Move profile checking back until just before inlining #101011
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Enable control flow guard for mono on windows #101293
    area-Build-mono
  • Fix Redundant bound check for span.Length == 0 pattern #101323
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mt] Add signalR WBT on WASM browser app #100723
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono, os-browser
  • Run trimming tests as AOT tests #101229
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Fix mismatch between boxed/unboxed method entrypoints #99443
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr

Updated

  • [Testing] Merge #91646 into release/8.0-staging #101313
    area-Infrastructure
  • Make normal statics simpler #99183
    NO-MERGE, area-VM-coreclr
  • Simplify managed MetadataImport creation #101353
    area-VM-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Remove received bytes length check #100619
    area-System.Net.Sockets, community-contribution
  • Linker dependency framework #101277
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Commit Accounting related changes #100380
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Tensor prototype #101196
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [mono] Miscellaneous startup optimizations #101263
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [mono] Optimize startup vtable setup #101312
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [wasm] Don't use SyncTextWriter in single-threaded wasm builds #101221
    arch-wasm, area-CoreLib-mono
  • Prefer most derived member in Configuration Binder source generator #101316
    area-Extensions-Configuration
  • Arm64/Sve: Predicated Abs, Predicated/UnPredicated Add, Conditional Select #100743
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, arch-arm64-sve
  • Fix class construction cycle in Lock on NativeAOT #100374
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Convert OAVariant interop to managed #100176
    area-Interop-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Revise compiler hardening options on Unix #98622
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • Reapply params ReadOnlySpan overloads without params keyword #101308
    area-System.Memory, 9.0.0
  • Add managed blocking info for lock and monitor waits #101192
    area-System.Threading, 9.0.0
  • Refresh our "dev-innerloop" pipeline jobs #101304
    area-Infrastructure
  • Make mutable generic collection interfaces implement read-only collection interfaces #95830
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • Add GC heap hard limit for 32 bit #101024
    area-GC-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Expose the `ConvertToIntegerNative` APIs #100993
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0
  • Add dynamic allocation sampling following a Poisson process instead of using a static threshold #100356
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [browser] More meaningful code in browser template #101287
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Create separate attribute for warning behavior differences #101220
    area-Tools-ILLink
  • [browser] firefox testing #100697
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [mono][wasm] Fix function signature mismatch in m2n invoke #101106
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Annotate `config.GetValue()` with `[NotNullIfNotNull]` #101336
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Bump minimum Apple OS versions #101342
    area-Infrastructure
  • Fix data race leading to a deadlock when opening QuicStream #101250
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Add support for Sve.UnzipEven/Odd & Sve.ZipHighLow #101294
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arch-arm64-sve
  • Avoid some defensive copies on readonly structs in System.Net.Quic #101133
    area-System.Net
  • [release/6.0-staging] TypeDescriptor threading fixes #101306
    area-System.ComponentModel
  • [wasi] Implement TODO in mono-threads-wasi.S #101337
    NO-MERGE, area-VM-meta-mono
  • [browser] Integrate static web asset endpoints into wasm sdk #101315
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [browser] Fix ConvertDllsToWebCil stack dump on bad input to be error message with input path #101162
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Support for WASI threads #98120
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, community-contribution, os-wasi
  • Fix `NamespaceCache` usage in `System.Private.Xml.Linq` #101158
    area-System.Xml, community-contribution
  • [mono] Fix `LLVMArgWasmVtypeAsScalar` when a method doesn't set its return value #101299
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-JIT-mono, 9.0.0
  • Tiny improvement of `StringBuilder.Append(StringBuilder)` #101020
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • JIT ARM64-SVE: Add Count*BitElements #101188
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arch-arm64-sve
  • Adjust the calleeSavedRegs on top frame for LoongArch64/RISCV64 #100962
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64, arch-riscv
  • Fix running tests with process isolation under naot #100331
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [RISC-V] Use common CodeGen::genHomeRegisterParams #101288
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Fix unnecessary bounds check with ulong index #101352
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Refresh cached credentials after PreAuthenticate fails #101053
    area-System.Net.Http
  • JIT: Rewrite initial parameter frame layout in terms of new ABI info #101340
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT ARM64-SVE: Add Sve.LoadVector*ZeroExtendTo*() #101291
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arch-arm64-sve
  • TypeName parsing API #100094
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0
  • Implement WriteStringValueSegment defined in Issue 67337 #101356
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [mono] Interpret static constructors without a runtime invoke wrapper #101324
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [Test Only] Ignore, just to run some tests. #99339
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW
  • Add option to change SVE vector length for current and children processes #101295
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-arm64-sve
  • [Test Only] Async interruptions on safepoints with callsite fixups #101341
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-CodeGen-coreclr, runtime-coreclr
  • Allow async interruptions on safepoints #95565
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Seal overridden virtual method `SetDefaultFallbacks` #100030
    area-System.Text.Encoding, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • NativeAOT-LLVM: Compile fails due to invalid cast error #2555

PullRequests

Created

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Normalize struct local field stores #2556

Merged

Updated

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Merge apr 24 #2543
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • dotnet 6.0.26+ SDK NuGet.Packaging Dependencies Vulnerable? #40355
  • Expand MSBuild Properties when parsing launchSettings.json for dotnet run #40352
  • dotnet format - Simplify interpolation (IDE0071) - false positive with Enum and FormattableString #40347
  • x64 sdk gets stuck during installation and cannot be installed normally on ARM64. #40346

PullRequests

Created

  • Ignore generic type parameter names when matching #40359
    untriaged, Area-ApiCompat
  • Add RazorLangVersion 9 #40348
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore

Merged

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.2xx' => 'release/8.0.3xx' #40326
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Add BeforeMicrosoftNETSdkTargets #40344
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK
  • Allow 'Add project reference' for existing projects #40133
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.3xx' => 'main' #40324
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Re-enable a bunch of container tests #40191
    untriaged, Area-Containers

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Include Runtime information in S_COMPILE3 #73183
    17.11
  • Debug assertion failure in MethodSymbol.AsMember when called from NullableWalker.GetNullableOfTValueSlot #73182
    17.11
  • Debug assertion failure in MethodSymbol.AsMember when called from Binder.UnwrapCollectionExpressionIfNullable #73181
    Backlog
  • RegisterAdditionalFileAction doesn't seem to fire when such a file is frontmost #73179
  • Extract New Class Refactoring Request #73178
  • Prefix "extension" for "extension method" in Japanese must be "拡張", not "拡張子" #73175
  • The assembly update failed. #73173

Closed

  • In IIncrementalValuesProvider method Where with CancellationToken is not accessible. #72919
  • Improve source generator UX by fishing for dependencies #72980
  • MSBuildWorkspace.OpenProjectAsync cannot load Solution Filter .slnf #73105
    Backlog
  • Use of unassigned local variable #72974
  • Narrowing conversion required for future `Option Strict On` should not be marked as redundant when `Option Strict Off` at least by default #73176
  • Cleanup Microsoft.CommonLanguageServerProtocol.Framework #72251
    17.10
  • C# Dictionary key initializer statement can throw a surprising KeyNotFoundException (by omitting 'new T') #73177

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove reflection code for C# code mapper #73186
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Enable hosts to provide custom assembly resolution #73185
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Use a small subset of VS JSON converters for VS Code #73180
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Remove mention of removed option `bootstrapConfig` from docs #73174
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Check UI context before trying to initialize cohosting #73172
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Mmf cleanup no dispose #73164
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Test if code is needed #73163
    Area-IDE, untriaged

Merged

  • Fix example in cookbook #73184
    Bug, Area-Compilers, Documentation, untriaged, Next
  • Cleanup binary version of clasp now that consumers have moved over #73096
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Simplify temporary storage subsystem. #73165
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.10 to main #73062
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.9 to release/dev17.10 #72947
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts

Updated

  • Cleanup our temp-storage (memory mapped file) code. #73115
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Mmf cleanup5 #73146
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Mmf cleanup4 #73145
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Mmf cleanup3 #73142
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Mmf cleanup2 #73143
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Mmf cleanup1 #73144
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • DO NOT MERGE. Implement MEF based pull diagnostics #73073
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Optimize codegen for collections expression of single spread of `ReadOnlySpan` for collection builder emit strategy #73102
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Onboard VB intellisense page to Unified Settings #72471
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Visit binary operators in ref safety analysis #73081
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Specially handle more scenarios for type parameters with 'allows ref struct' constraint #73111
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - RefStructInterfaces
  • Update referenced MSBuild to 17.3.4 #73113
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged
  • Use a simple temp instead of InlineArray1 #73086
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Allow unsafe blocks in iterators #73046
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Ref/Unsafe in Iterators/Async
  • Ensure source paths are comparable with editorconfig directory paths #73100
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • [C#] Make interpolated strings including string or char constants as optimized as `+` operator #72308
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Blazor Server registers page 'unload' event instead of the recommended 'pagehide' or 'visibilitychange events #55299
  • Quarantine HeartbeatLoopRunsWithSpecifiedInterval #55297
  • Perf regression: json #55292
  • Perf improvement: mvc #55291
  • Burstable capacity? #55289
  • `/*#__PURE__*/` annotations dont work well with Vite / Rollup #55286
  • XSRF-TOKEN Extraction #55284
  • Configurable buffer size for TransmitDataStreamToJS.TransmitStreamAsync #55283
    Backlog
  • http.server.active_requests metric incorrect when behind TLS-terminating load balancer #55280
  • Codespaces doesn't initialize correctly #55272
  • Blazor static SSR page script onDispose is called after as document DOM synchronized #55270
    Backlog
  • SignalR client error: The server disconnected before the handshake could be started. #55268

Closed

  • Exception middlewares introduce duplicates of error.type diagnostic tags in some situations #55159
  • Blazor.registerCustomEventType doesn't work with static SSR #55273
  • Perf improvement: fortunes #55269
  • Published size regression: basicminimalapipublishaot #55207
  • Published size regression: basicminimalapipublishaot #55258
  • Failing `signalr.client.java.Tests` on helix because of missing `java` #54775
    9.0-preview4
  • Prevent Identity lockout mechanism telling hackers which UserNames exist. #54542
  • Some APIs do not verify the TOKNE expiration date #54635
  • Blazor SSR with streaming disabled doesn't await child components #55261
  • Blazor time to first UI improvement: blazorwasmbenchmark #55265
  • HttpClient doesn't have authentication headers during OnInitialized or OnAfterRender when using global InteractiveAuto rendering #55262
  • Provide a mechanism for rendering Blazor pages statically even when the app is set up for interactive rendering #51046
    9.0-preview4
  • Swagger (Get Index.html) fails when reflection-based serialization has been disabled. #54377
  • Blazor WASM App navigation won't stop image request when image is a stream (webcam) #55219
  • Perf improvement: json, json_spring #55263

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/8.0] Fix duplicate error.type tags in metrics #55301
    Servicing-consider, area-hosting, 8.0.x
  • Avoid detecting AOT within other characters as a candidate for labeling. #55300
    area-infrastructure
  • Quarantine HeartbeatLoopRunsWithSpecifiedInterval #55298
    area-networking
  • Run tests against latest IdentityModel once per day in Helix-Matrix #55296
    area-infrastructure
  • Address feedback on PR #54675 #55295
    area-dataprotection
  • Remove AccountLayout.razor from project template #55294
    area-blazor
  • Fix inheritdoc tag for ObjectPool.Create() #55293
    area-networking
  • Delete flaky test MultipleThreadsForceRefresh #55290
    area-dataprotection
  • [release/8.0] Change how ANCM recycles app #55288
    Servicing-approved, area-networking, 8.0.x
  • Update to new interceptable location APIs #55285
    feature-rdg, area-minimal
  • [H/3] Fix code passed into QuicConnection.CloseAsync and QuicStream.Abort #55282
    area-networking
  • Update .NET SDK to 9.0.100-preview.4.24221.5 #55275
    area-infrastructure, Type: Dependency Update :arrow_up_small:
  • Adding accept header to callsites within SignalR #55271
    area-signalr, community-contribution

Merged

  • Condition RIDs on which target RIDs are available when doing a VMR build #55172
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview4
  • Fix duplicate error.type tags #55211
    area-hosting, 9.0-preview4
  • Sleep in MultipleThreadsForceRefresh #55231
    area-dataprotection, 9.0-preview4
  • FlyBy typo fix in FeatureCollectionExtensions.cs #55217
    community-contribution, area-networking, 9.0-preview4
  • Add amendable OverscanCount parameter to the QuickGrid for virtualization. #55078
    area-blazor, community-contribution, 9.0-preview4
  • Don't output secret value from user-secrets set #55209
    area-commandlinetools, 9.0-preview4
  • Change how ANCM recycles app #52807
    feature-iis, area-networking, 9.0-preview4
  • Removing noReload argument from WebDriverExtensions.Nagivate #55143
    area-blazor, community-contribution, 9.0-preview4

Updated

  • HybridCache - minor post-PR fixes #55251
    area-infrastructure, feature-caching
  • Add support for generating JSON schemas in OpenAPI doc #55208
    area-mvc, feature-openapi, area-minimal
  • Retry `Microsoft.AspNetCore.DataProtection.KeyManagement.KeyRingProviderTests.MultipleThreadsForceRefresh` #55228
    area-infrastructure
  • ALWAYS include the Vary Accept-Encoding header when response compression is enabled #55092
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-middleware
  • Fix route pattern analyzer false positive with catch-all parameter #55129
    area-mvc, analyzer, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • App assumes dark mode after resume on device with UIAlertController presented #21986
  • .NET MAUI > Publish iOS Enterprise App > Wrong Profile #21984
  • GradientBrushes are not supported on Shape.Stroke #21983
  • ListView shows two items on one line and crashes when clicking (windows) #21981
  • IndicatorView with DataTemplate (custom image) does not render correctly on ItemsSource change (Android & iOS) #21980
  • [ci] Security tasks #21979
    .NET 8 SR5
  • ToolbarItem property not updated when PropertyChanged is triggered in the ViewModel #21976
  • Java.Lang.IllegalArgumentException: 'No view found for id #21975
  • ListView/CollectionView faulty height calculation in Grid with multiple columns #21974
  • Android crash at startup with System.ArgumentNullException: ArgumentNull_Generic Arg_ParamName_Name, services on MauiApplication #21973
  • Picker Crash App on iOS Simulation #21972
  • Terrible performance of MAUI Shell Tabs #21971
  • Layout cycle crash on Windows with Button with image inside FlexLayout #21970

Closed

  • Maui Hybrid: build fails when adding json file to ./Resources/Raw #17078
  • Breakpoints do not work when debugging configuration other than Debug #20132
  • The "XamlCTask" task failed unexpectedly. #21910
  • [Testing] Setup scaffolding for legacy test runner #21410
    .NET 8 SR5
  • [8.0.10] Windows FontImageSourceService assumes MSIX packaging #21333
    .NET 8 SR5

PullRequests

Created

  • Re-generate template localization #21988
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/templates 📄

Merged

  • add unit test for EnumerableExtensions #21978
    community ✨
  • [WinUI] `GesturePlatformManager.Windows.cs` - unused variable #21953
    community ✨
  • IndexOf() stackOverflow fix (#20083) #21965
    community ✨
  • [net9.0] Fix apiscan version for net9 #21977
  • Setup scaffolding for legacy test runner #21423
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing

Updated

  • [iOS] Add UITest for #21806 #21951
    area/navigation 🧭, platform/iOS 🍎, area/shell 🐢, area/controls 🎮, area/testing, control-entry, area/keyboard
  • [Windows] Remove 2nd WebView used to add `base` tag when using HtmlWebViewSource #21892

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • a bug in UseInMemoryDatabase #33593
  • Complex types throw for SQL Server views #33592
  • Entity Framework Core creates unnecessary foreign key for owned type when using TPT mapping strategy #33591
  • Test ordering issue #33590
  • EF Tools Migration Bundle Ignores --force option when specifying a output directory #33589
  • Collection of primitives to JSON column --> Navigation #33585

Closed

  • Add ServiceCollection extension method for removing a DbContext or its options #33571
    9.0.0-preview1
  • string.Length not translated for raw SqlQuery expressions #33272
    9.0.0-preview4

PullRequests

Merged

  • TINY: Reference analyzers project as usual under R#/Rider #33587
  • Fix string.Length translation after SqlQuery #33580

Updated

  • Annotate most of the Cosmos query pipeline for NRTs #33584

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-22
entry.content:
PullRequests

Created

  • Rebootstrap with latest changes #19555
  • Fix msbuild downgrade issue #19554
    DO NOT MERGE

Merged

  • Add runtime patch to get passing SB Alpine leg #19558
  • Enable building "non-official" VMR builds #19491

Updated

  • Enable scenario test execution in VMR build #19222
  • Publish Test Results in PR Validation #19533
  • Use the VMR commit hash for dotnet --info #18941
  • Update the fluent assertions version to improve test failure output. #17982
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.3xx' => 'main' #19545
